name: TheAtlantic
text:
The gravest of what-ifs has become a “what now?”: President Trump’s COVID-19 diagnosis will intensify a wide-reaching global crisis, @alexismadrigal and @yayitsrob write:

https://t.co/hCcYNDnKzh

name: TheAtlantic
text: President Trump and Melania Trump have COVID-19. During a reporting trip to the White House in May, @PeterAtlantic observed that coronavirus precautions were “shockingly lax.” https://t.co/QCk5kLFRxU

name: TheAtlantic
text:
Donald Trump’s COVID-19 diagnosis raises a chain-reaction question: When, exactly, was the president infected? And who else might be sick?
@alexismadrigal and @yayitsrob report: https://t.co/ltWIeqYqMr

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "...Had I removed my mask for some reason and coughed or sneezed, there was no hint of a mask patrol prepared to whisk me out the [White House]. The vibe was shockingly lax." -- @PeterAtlantic. Read more here: 
https://t.co/K2UiMK4BQJ

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @nora_kelly: .@PeterAtlantic in May: "Trump, who likes to project a certain hypermasculine invincibility, has faced greater exposure than he might let on." https://t.co/4ZzwnBwSO3

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @JohnGHendy: “People began speculating that nuclear command planes may have been dispatched shortly before the announcement of the positive test.” https://t.co/Y5a53ghFvW via @alexismadrigal and @yayitsrob

name: TheAtlantic
text: The Atlantic Daily: We’re sharing the stories of the children who desegregated America’s schools. https://t.co/NfjyY225wW

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Trump believed that taking the coronavirus seriously would panic the markets, threatening his presidency and his chance at reelection. Now his own denialism has placed both his presidency and his campaign in peril," writes @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/XeOGb2Q9qg

name: TheAtlantic
text: By the time the first people land on Mars, COVID-19 will likely be a distant memory, writes @marinakoren. But the pandemic could still erode Americans’ desire to leave Earth and explore other worlds. https://t.co/7df33wNxzO
